ygData.subject: RE: Re: Monk Loot and Modifications (was Re: An idea for the slow day)
ygData.msgSnippet: Yeah, I ve been beta ing AC, and you can chose to the shade what color skin, clothing, eyes, hair, hairstyle, etc. you get.  Granted however at least on the
ygData.messageBody:
Yeah, I've been beta'ing AC, and you can chose to the shade what color skin,
clothing, eyes, hair, hairstyle, etc. you get. Granted however at least on
the low end you all start looking hte same as you buy gear, but it is a nice
change.

The thing is with graphics, they are simply not going to put in new stuff
for the old continents. The expansion pack will add some new textures and
the requirements (hardware) while yer there are higher so they can give you
some more degrees of differentiation, but from what I understand it will
only be like that in those new areas.

What I would suggest, since they won't add textures, is that if you want a
different look you /feeback and email for more monk coloration (colors are
not textures as I understand it). Bout the best we can hope for.

- Chai
-----Original Message-----
From: Hayley Gordon [mailto:kegco@...]
Sent: Saturday, August 28, 1999 7:30 PM
To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
Subject: re: Re: Monk Loot and Modifications (was Re: [EQ-Monks] An idea
for the slow day)



Oh, it's so great in Asheron's Call, everyone does look different. Maybe
they will
include new graphics in the expansion set?


>
> For enhanced graphics, I think there should be an optional download...
> maybe some people would want to download a 300 MB file. I know i would
> want to. Im tired of everyone looking the same anyhow. I hear that in
> Asheron's Call everyone looks much different from each other than they
do in
> EQ. Maybe the next EQ addon will address this (if there is one, more $
for
> Verant).
>
> Sleet
> Brell Serilis
>
